title: Social
description: A social media website built on React and Django.
about: Social is a social media platform that allows users to create content, comment and follow each other.

title: Facial Recognition App
description: Project made in Python that uses the module face-recognition It is used to analyze surveillance cameras and look for criminals or missing people.

title: Ferreira's Website
description: A website made for a lawyer, containing Sass animations, a form that sends an email, and a blog functionality.

title: Task Manager
description: Basic task manager that creates, updates, and deletes tasks on local storage.

title: Task Manager API
description: Task Manager API that allows users to log in, and do CRUDE operations on tasks.

title: Flight Deals Searcher
description: Python app that does webscrapping to look for flight offers and sends an email if a lower price is available

title: Weather Forecast
description: Python app that alerts the user via SMS about rain conditions

title: Stocks Monitor
description: App that alerts the user about changes in stock prices
